description.value:
Requirements You have a creature @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrained}.

Your iron grip slowly saps your opponent's strength. Attempt an Athletics check to Grapple the creature you have grabbed or restrained, with the following effects instead of the usual effects.

Critical Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of its next turn and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute.

Success The target is enfeebled 1 until the end of its next turn.
